attributes.action: Strengthen laws to deter/ prevent persecution of all raptors throughout the UK.
attributes.background: A recent video featuring Chris Packham was released showing evidence that persecution of the Golden Eagle is still a regular occurrance.. We need to do more to stop the disappearance of all our raptors!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure how you would like legislation to protect raptors strengthened.

You could start a new petition setting out clear what you would like to happen.
